name: Panaberto Pompones
description: Panaberto Pompones is member of “Los Mininos”, one of the smuggling bands most known in the Tijuana and San Diego frontier, Yoda Long is a police officer that works as undercover to get into "Los Mininos" organization, her mission is to dismantle it, after discovering that they've been betrayed by their organizations, the only thing left to do is to run for their lives while trying to solve their problem and clean their reputation.
